recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta in salted water
2. Fry pancetta until crispy
3. Beat eggs with cheese and pepper
4. Toss hot pasta with pancetta
5. Mix in egg mixture off heat
6. Serve immediately with more cheese

recipes.title: Tonnarelli Cacio e Pepe
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta in salted water
2. Reserve some pasta water
3. Mix grated cheese with black pepper
4. Add hot pasta to cheese mixture
5. Add a bit of pasta water to create creamy sauce
6. Serve immediately with more pepper
